Definition:Â  Proxy Marriage
A
proxy marriage
is a marriage contracted or celebrated by one or more agents acting on behalf of the actual parties to the marriage.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Establishing Other Types of Marriages
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
